department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Responsive maintenance services for the Crown owned portfolio
description: The Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) requires cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown owned portfolio. The work can be customized based on the Client's needs.
full_summary:
=====================================

# Government Contracting Announcement: W3701-24-BA01

**Project Title:** Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Bagotville

**Solicitation Number:** WS4173856250

**Date:** December 4, 2023

**Closing Date:** February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

## Project Overview
================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking a contractor to provide responsive maintenance and minor improvement services for Crown-owned properties in Bagotville, Saguenay.

## Categories and Services
=========================

This project requires the following services:

* Flooring
* Residential painting
* Carpentry
* Roofing
* Hazardous material decontamination

## Submission Requirements
=====================

To be considered, contractors must submit their bids by February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

## Notice of Amendment
=====================

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time has been amended. Contractors are required to submit their supporting documentation and bids by February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST.

## Teleconference
================

An optional teleconference will be held on December 19, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST in English and December 20, 2023 at 1:00 PM EST in French. Contractors must confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by December 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST.

## Contact Information
=====================

Quinn, Carine Thibodeau (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Important Links
=====================

* [Government Contracting Announcement](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18182857?extsite=MTgxODI4NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

This announcement is posted on the Ariba Discovery platform. Contractors must register to access the project details. 

Please note that the full contract award will depend on the selection criteria, such as the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
